de.esoco.lib.comm

Class GraylogLogging

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.lib.logging.LogAspect<T>
        • de.esoco.lib.logging.BusinessLogAspect<GraylogMessage>
          • de.esoco.lib.comm.GraylogLogging
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.obrel.core.Relatable

    public class GraylogLogging
extends BusinessLogAspect<GraylogMessage>
    A logging implementation that sends log messages to a Graylog server. The endpoint address of the Graylog server must be set on this instance with the relation type CommunicationRelationTypes.ENDPOINT_ADDRESS before invoking the LogAspect.initLogging() method.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class de.esoco.lib.logging.LogAspect

        MAX_LOGGING_ERRORS, MIN_LOG_LEVEL, MIN_STACK_LOG_LEVEL
